fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Build a wonder at a target’s house.
- Build the Great Wall of China. (Costs 12 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Wonders redirect all players visiting within 2 houses (not including dead houses) to the house with the wonder. You generate 1 gold for each redirected player.
- The Great Wall permanently prevents players from visiting the other half of the town. The host determines where the half is divided.
- When you pay to build the Great Wall, the town will be notified that the Great Wall is under construction. You may not act the next night, and the Great Wall does not go into effect until the day after.
- The Great Wall will be destroyed when China dies.
- Passively generate 2 gold each night.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were ambushed by Chinese Crouching Tigers.” (Factional Kill)
“The Great Wall of China is under construction!” (Public notification)
